column4: is there any bardcode reader for ubuntu, where I could enter barcode number and it would display where my product was made ant ect?
Any barcode reader will work fine.  They just send keyboard codes
I dont need any barcode reader via usb or web cam, I need barcode reader software, where I could type in barcode number and it whould show where that product was made
Oh sorry, I misunderstood.  I don't know of any software like that.
